Name: Pincushion
About the game: In this little game you have to throw needles into the needle bed. In this case, the needles must not touch each other. The game is on the reaction speed, so you need to choose the exact moment for the throw in order to seat all the needles there. Use your mouse buttons for throws. Good luck to you.
